resources.string: screen light is currently on, slide to turn off
screen light is currently off, slide to turn on
LED is currently on, slide to turn off
LED is currently off, slide to turn on
you can click here to turn off LED
open flash light error, check if you has a flash light

This is an easy to use lighting tool, using the phone screen and camera led.

 When using the screen as light, the screen will not dim unless you quit or switch off.
 When using the led as light, the led will keep a notification in the notification bar to remind you.
 you can slide on the screen to toggle light.

 Any suggestion, please contact feitian124@yunnuy.com, thanks.
